author: Ines Kahnwald
quote: Have you heard of Master Zhuang’s paradox? 'I dreamt I was a butterfly. Now I’ve woken up and I no longer know if I’m a person who dreamed he’s a butterfly or if I’m a butterfly who’s dreaming it’s a person.

author: Mikkel Nielsen
quote: There is no such thing as magic, just illusion. Things only change when we change them. But you have to do it skillfully, in secret. Then it seems like magic.

author: Noah
quote: We are all full of sin. No pure human being exists. But no matter what we do, we never fall any lower than into God's hands.
